title: Group of 4 T205 cards, discounts for larger purchases
author: brianp-beme

posts.post_title: Group of 4 T205 cards, discounts for larger purchases
posts.post_content:
I have the following T205 cards available for purchase. Shipping will be $3.00. Accepting Paypal only. 

Looking to sell these, so I am offering the following discounts for larger purchases: Buy 2 or more cards, free shipping.  Commitment to buy snags these cards, and I will ship promptly and securely in a padded envelope.

Brian

Chief Bender  $65 (Received Payment stamp on back)  SOLD
Forrest Cady  $19  SOLD
Otis Crandall  $23 ('T' uncrossed, water? damage on top border)
Clyde Milan  $22 (short)
